pullRequest.title: Supply matrixstack to IRenderHandler where possible. Closes #6439
pullRequest.bodyText:
Sky renderhandlers are completely useless currently because you don't have the matrix stack representing the current transform.
This isn't very clean and I'd rather just blow up irenderhandler and split it up, but an RB has already been released, so hacks it is.

nodes.bodyText:
This breaks the @FunctionalInterface on certian compilers IIRC. As it only works with one method.
Why remove the MC argument? I understand you can get it from Minecraft.getInstane, but having it passed in seems like better practice.
Why not just do that now and make this class as deprecated, and have the children extend it?

commit.message: Supply matrixstack to IRenderHandler where possible. Closes #6439
